item.description:
***Singles Dance*** 35 +
How about dancing off some of the Thanksgiving goodies.
When: Saturday, November 24, 2012
Where: Courtyard Marriott Hotel in Billerica
Time: Let's meet at 7:00
Free Hor D'ouevres and Door Prize Drawings.

The Cost is 10.00 Please ***Note***to get this cheap rate tell them you are with the POF group..(its advertised on a singles sight)

 

***Dress code: No cut off jeans, sneakers..Jeans are acceptable..Its also nice to Dress to impress***

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: "SINGLES" Dance Party Saturday Billerica
